mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblJobPost ( jobPostNo, companyId, title, jobHistory, jobSalary, startDate, endDate, content, method, addNotice, managerName, managerPhone, managerEmail, postThumbnail, postAddress, postAddressDetail, postZonecode, postViewYn, workCode, jobRankCode, workTypeCode, educationCode ) VALUES ( NULL, #{JP.companyId}, #{JP.title}, #{JP.jobHistory}, #{JP.jobSalary}, #{JP.startDate}, #{JP.endDate}, #{JP.content}, #{JP.method}, #{JP.addNotice}, #{JP.managerName}, #{JP.managerPhone}, #{JP.managerEmail}, #{JP.postThumbnail}, #{JP.postAddress}, #{JP.postAddressDetail}, #{JP.postZonecode}, #{JP.postViewYn}, #{JP.workCode}, #{JP.jobRankCode}, #{JP.workTypeCode}, #{JP.educationCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.jobPostNo, P.title, P.startDate, P.endDate, GWT.name AS workTypeCode, P.jobHistory, GT.name AS workCode FROM tblJobPost P JOIN (SELECT * FROM tblGubn WHERE groupCode = 'WORK_TYPE') GWT ON P.workTypeCode = GWT.code JOIN (SELECT * FROM tblGubn WHERE groupCode = 'WORK') GT ON P.workCode = GT.code WHERE P.companyId = #{companyId} AND P.deleteYn = 'N' ORDER BY P.jobPostNo DESC

SELECT A.jobPostNo, A.resumeNo, B.title, C.userName, A.passYn, A.aplcHstrDate FROM tblAplcHstr A JOIN tblResume B ON A.resumeNo = B.resumeNo JOIN tblUser C ON B.userId = C.userId AND C.userIsActive = 'Y' WHERE A.jobPostNo = #{jobPostNo};

SELECT title, jobHistory, jobSalary, startDate, endDate, content, method, addNotice, managerName, managerPhone, managerEmail, postThumbnail, postAddress, postAddressDetail, postZonecode, postViewYn, workCode, jobRankCode, workTypeCode, educationCode FROM tblJobPost WHERE jobPostNo = #{jobPostNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE tblJobPost SET title = #{JP.title}, jobHistory = #{JP.jobHistory}, jobSalary = #{JP.jobSalary}, startDate = #{JP.startDate}, endDate = #{JP.endDate}, content = #{JP.content}, method = #{JP.method}, addNotice = #{JP.addNotice}, managerName = #{JP.managerName}, managerPhone = #{JP.managerPhone}, managerEmail = #{JP.managerEmail}, postThumbnail = #{JP.postThumbnail}, postAddress = #{JP.postAddress}, postAddressDetail = #{JP.postAddressDetail}, postZonecode = #{JP.postZonecode}, postViewYn = #{JP.postViewYn}, workCode = #{JP.workCode}, jobRankCode = #{JP.jobRankCode}, workTypeCode = #{JP.workTypeCode}, educationCode = #{JP.educationCode} WHERE jobPostNo = #{JP.jobPostNo}
mapper.delete: UPDATE tblJobPost SET deleteYn = 'Y' WHERE jobPostNo=#{jobPostNo};
